author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SARA CONTINUES TO PRODUCE POTENTIALLY CATASTROPHIC FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...SARA CONTINUES TO PRODUCE POTENTIALLY CATASTROPHIC FLOODING OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 12:00 AM CST Sun Nov 17
 the center of Sara was located near 16.6, -87.6
 with movement WNW at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Sara (AT4/AL192024)
